thread.title: Oracle's Annual Meeting of Stockholders to Be Held November 18, 2015
thread.title_full: Oracle's Annual Meeting of Stockholders to Be Held November 18, 2015

author: admin
title: Oracle's Annual Meeting of Stockholders to Be Held November 18, 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/16/2015 @ 1:00 PM   Oracle Corporation 
REDWOOD SHORES, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/16/15 -- On Wednesday, November 18, 2015, Oracle (NYSE: ORCL) will hold its Annual Meeting of Stockholders at 10:00 a.m. PT in the Oracle Conference Center, located at 350 Oracle Parkway, Redwood City at Oracle's headquarters. Oracle's stockholders of record as of September 21, 2015 are invited to attend the meeting and should refer to Oracle's proxy statement available at www.oracle.com/investor for details regarding required documentation to gain admission to the meeting. 
The meeting will also be webcast live via the Investor Relations homepage at www.oracle.com/investor . An archived copy of the webcast will be available for replay on demand following the meeting. 
About Oracle Oracle offers a comprehensive and fully integrated stack of cloud applications and platform services. For more information about Oracle (NYSE: ORCL), visit www.oracle.com or contact Investor Relations at investor_us@oracle.com or (650) 506-4073.
